nodes.text: The Transit District was a district of the Kaon City on Kaon during the Galactic War. During the Tion Hegemony rakghoul outbreak in 3639 BBY the district was overrun by rakghouls, who attacked the strike team making their way to the Kaon City Spaceport.
The Transit District appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the "Kaon Under Siege" flashpoint.
